explanation: [0-0] On a lush green meadow, a man in a black short-sleeved polo shirt is bending over and pointing at the ground.

[0-7] The man points his finger at the ground and steps back. Immediately, a diamond-shaped hole appears in the ground, filled with swimming red carp, resembling a fishpond. Another man in the same attire stands not far behind him. The man in front then jumps into the fishpond and disappears from the screen, and the fishpond disappears along with him. The man behind him, looking puzzled, walks up to the spot and bends down, pointing at the ground.
